nodes.text: Priorities is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 28, 2004 and described the multiple starships owned by Darrus Jeht, in the context of an encounter with Aayla Secura and Trilinae.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, it allowed certain starship upgrades to be purchased by player-characters.
